value.title: Panasas Joins MLCommons to Advance Machine Learning Storage Innovation
value.excerpt: Panasas®, the data engine for innovation, today announced its collaboration with MLCommons ™, the consortium behind MLPerf™, to create industry-wide benchmarks for machine learning (ML) storage. Panasas will work with MLCommons to help steer these benchmarks by establishing best practices for measuring ML storage performance and ultimately helping to develop the next generation storage systems for AI/ML.
